member.name: SP_DEVINFO_LIST_DETAIL_DATA
member.summary: An SP_DEVINFO_LIST_DETAIL_DATA structure contains information about a device information set, such as its associated setup class GUID (if it has an associated setup class).

member.name: SP_DEVINFO_LIST_DETAIL_DATA.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the SP_DEVINFO_LIST_DETAIL_DATA structure.

member.name: SP_DEVINFO_LIST_DETAIL_DATA.ClassGuid
member.summary: The setup class GUID that is associated with the device information set or GUID_NULL if there is no associated setup class.

summary.para: If the device information set is for a remote computer, this member is a configuration manager machine handle for the remote computer. If the device information set is for the local computer, this member is NULL.
This is typically the parameter that components use to access the remote computer. The RemoteMachineName contains a string, in case the component requires the name of the remote computer.

member.name: SP_DEVINFO_LIST_DETAIL_DATA.RemoteMachineName
member.summary: A NULL-terminated string that contains the name of the remote computer. If the device information set is for the local computer, this member is an empty string.

member.name: SP_DEVINFO_LIST_DETAIL_DATA

This is typically the parameter that components use to access the remote computer. The RemoteMachineName contains a string, in case the component requires the name of the remote computer.

member.summary: A NULL-terminated string that contains the name of the remote computer. If the device information set is for the local computer, this member is an empty string.
